page.title: 12CRAFTSMEN-IRONBRIDGE
page.content: {YARRINGTON PIANOS. Mr and Mrs Yarrington buy old pianos from a warehouse to restore. They replace broken wood and on English pianos at the top they put a very thin piece of wood called veneer to make it look pretty. They check and replace hammers, jacks, dampers, and pedals. {COALBROOKDALE POTTERY The pottery is in Darby Road Coalbrookdale.They use clay from Stoke on Trent they also use iron sludge to colour their work. Mr.Tabberer makes stoneware and earthenware to sell in the Dale. {STAINED GLASS DESIGNS Mrs Green and her husband make stained glass designs. They use glass, copper foil, lathekin, oyster knife, lead knife crimper, glasscutter and pliers to make stained glass design pictures plaques terrariums and church windows.
